page.title: 16RECREATION IN SANDBACH
page.content: ALMOST ALL{RECREATION}FACILITIES ARE FOUND OUTSIDE OUR BLOCK IN SANDBACH BUT THEY ARE LIMITED BY THE SIZE OF THE TOWN. THERE IS A{LEISURE CENTRE} AND AN INDOOR SWIMMING POOL WHICH PROVIDES SUCH FACILITIES AS JUDO,TABLE TENNIS,SQUASH,BADMINTON,POP-MOBILITY AND GYMNASTICS. THERE HAS BEEN A FITNESS AND CONDITIONING SUITE RECENTLY INTRODUCED AND A BAR TO RECOVER IN AFTERWARDS. OTHER FACILITIES IN SANDBACH INCLUDE THE{ {PARK}WHICH BOASTS TWO TENNIS COURTS,A BOWLING GREEN AND A CHILDRENS PLAY AREA. FISHING PERMITS ARE AVAILABLE FOR DINGLE{LAKE.}THERE ARE LOCAL AMATEUR FOOTBALL CLUBS SUCH AS RAMBLERS,SAXONS AND CRUSADERS AND LOCAL SCOUTS,GUIDES,BROWNIES,CUBS AND YOUTH CLUB.
